title: Swap Cooper SMP logo/hero artwork assets and confirm Discord link across UI

requirements.summary: Replace the site logo and hero/banner background images by swapping the static assets at the existing paths referenced by the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero background image renders from /assets/generated/cooper-smp-hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png and visually matches the user-uploaded banner artwork.
The site logo renders from /assets/generated/cooper-smp-logo.dim_512x512.png in the hero section, navbar, and footer and visually matches the user-uploaded logo artwork.
All image assets are served as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend routing for images).
Images render correctly on desktop and mobile without broken links (no 404s for the two asset URLs).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing hero/banner background static asset with the user-uploaded artwork while keeping the exact filename and location so current UI references continue to work.
Replace the existing logo static asset with the user-uploaded artwork while keeping the exact filename and location so current UI references continue to work.

requirements.summary: Ensure the Discord link across the site is https://discord.gg/coopersmp and that the Contact section button links to it in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: The Discord button in the Contact section points to https://discord.gg/coopersmp and opens in a new tab.
No other Discord URL placeholders remain in the UI or configuration.

file_operations.description: Verify site-wide Discord URL configuration is set to https://discord.gg/coopersmp and update it if any placeholder or different value exists.

Verify the Contact section Discord button uses the configured Discord URL (siteConfig.discordUrl), points to https://discord.gg/coopersmp, and opens in a new tab (target/_blank with rel noopener noreferrer).
